TopicTitle: KSP Re-entry effects partially not working

Articles.Content:
Hello, forums!

I had a new Windows 7 computer that runs KSP perfectly, except that whenever I reenter the atmosphere, the effects seem different from what I've seen on other KSP images.

Well, the craft does turn red and all that, but there's no trailing glow. It's not really an issue, but it's making me wonder if I have any missing textures.

To clarify:

This is what is considered normal:

And this is what I see:

I think it's with my computer, I've tried KSP on Mac as well and the effects would work.

KSP: 0.90 32-Bit

Problem: Re-entry effects partially not working

Mods installed: Adjustable Landing Gear, Component Space Shuttle, Camera Tools, Environmental Visual Enhancer and HyperEdit.

System: Windows 7 32-bit

Thanks in advance!
Did you set the aerodynamic effects to minimal?

It's currently set to "Normal" so, no.

I'll look into that. Thanks for replying!
Your problem is probably hardware support. Without an output log, I can't give more information, but you could be forcing OpenGL or DX11 with a graphics card that doesn't support it for KSPs effects.

Thanks for replying!

I'll see if I can show an output log. For the graphics card, I believe it was a Nvdia GeForce.

I'm on a different system, so I'll have to check at a later time.

Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX

Processor: Intel® Core i5 CPU

Installed memory (RAM): 4.00GB (3.87GB usable

System Type: 64-Bit Operating System

We'll still need the logs to be able to tell any more, there's a KSP.log in the main game folder and an output_log.txt in the KSP_Data folder, you can upload their contents to pastebin.com.

Do you get any flame effects on an unmodded install?

Well, here's my output log: http://pastebin.com/E7rL50MK

And here's my KSP log: http://pastebin.com/GvsFX72L

Well, I've been having the same problems even without mods. It's normal with other systems, so it might be because of the graphics card.

Thanks for the support!
